monthlyReflections.reflectionQuestion: You averaged 4,672 steps daily with 8.4 hours of wear time. Your top emotions were happy, motivated, and tired, and your top activities were walking, stretching, and balance training. What made this month special?
monthlyReflections.reflectionResponse: This month was special because I got to take care of my grandson's dog for a whole week. It kept me on my feet, taking it for walks every day. It was such a joy to have the little one around, and I felt more active than usual. It brought back fond memories of when I had pets of my own.
